dcterms:creator: Christopher Hidey
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: A corpus of Reddit comment pairs self-labeled by posters using the acronym FTFY (Fixed That For You). The dataset contains 1,083,520 contrastive comment pairs.
dcterms:title: Reddit FTFY Corpus

dcterms:creator: Christopher Hidey
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: A crowd-labeled set of 2,625 comments each paired with 5 new contrastive responses generated by additional annotators.
dcterms:title: Mechanical Turk (AMT) Dataset
